attributes.action: give Elton Pearce of Mount Pleasant Porth Rhondda an MBE for services to the children of the Ynyshir and Wattstown Area.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Elton is the sec of the local Boys and Girls for the last 34 years. In that time he has helped many children within the community. Without Mr Elton Pearce there would not be a place in the local community to help take the children off the roads. Mr Pearce has spent most of his spare time in the club helping behind the sweet shop and running the club.
